AboutMe

Part Developer, Part Adventurer...

BIO

As a kid growing up in Columbus Ohio, I seemed to always be taking things apart, tinkering with them, and sometimes even putting them back together. Starting out with model rockets and trains as a youth, classic cars as a teenager, and eventually progressing to advanced engines and gas turbines as an adult.

In 2015, having never traveled outside of the United States, I wanted to learn about some other cultures around the world. So, I set off with a single backpack and a one-way ticket to Thailand. Since that time, I have filled up a couple of passports, become an experienced scuba diver, and had the pleasure of being able to share my passion for science and technology with hundreds of children in Cambodia, Thailand, Vietnam and China.

In 2019, after not writing any code since college, I took up learning JavaScript as a hobby. I enjoyed it so much I decided to pursue it as a full time career. Enough talk, I need to go code now. Happy hacking!

Technical Work Experience

Full Stack Javascript Developer

Specializing in MERN Stack (MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReactJS, NodeJS) web app development. Currently building skills around Redux for global state management and advanced API features with NodeJS.

Ohio State University Aerospace Research Center

August 2012 - January 2015
Design Engineer

Design and build complex elecro-mechanical assemblies used in jet engine research experiments. Heavy emphasis on instrumentation and data acquisition (temperature, pressure, heat transfer) during high speed rotation.

Honda of America

April 2009 - August 2012
Manufacturing Engineer

Design and continuously improve tooling and manufacturing processes in a mass production environment. Maintain a budget and complete cost reduction projects. New model design change implementation for mass production.
